title: Bell Bottom Jeans for Women High Waisted Stretch Ripped Skinny Hole Classic Raw Hem Denim Flare Pants
description: Stretchy Comfort: Crafted from a highly stretchable fabric, these bell bottom jeans for women mold to your body shape and provide unparalleled comfort, allowing freedom of movement for an active lifestyle

Eye-Catching Raw Hem: With its raw hem detailing, these flare jeans for women present a fresh and unique aesthetic. Their unfinished edges give off a vintage, undone vibe for an effortlessly chic look

Ripped Design: Featuring a ripped hole at the knee, these jeans offer a distressed style that's right on-trend. Add a touch of edgy glamour to your everyday ensemble. The high waisted skinny fit contours your curves and gives a slimming effect for a confident, stylish strut
Classic Bell Bottom: Sporting a beloved bell-bottom design, these jeans create a flattering silhouette and give a nod to retro fashion, perfect for those who love a vintage-inspired look
Washing: Cold water hand wash or machine wash, do not bleach, air dry, please refer to the size chart before ordering, thank you
